name: Pokegal
body:
Alcy's dating sim PokeGal is anything but your typical dating sim game. It's a dating sim on the Go! 

If you have any brilliant ideas, let us know and we 'll put them into PokeGal!

The typical dating sim game is standard fare: Players court a bunch of girls, trying to get them to fall in love. That's where most dating sim end â€” PokeGal is just getting started. 

iTunes Featured #1 in Simulation & Role Playing in:
Argentina (#1) Armenia (#1) Australia (#2) Austria (#1) Belgium (#1) Botswana (#1) Bulgaria (#1) Canada (#1) Chile (#1) Colombia (#1) Croatia (#1) Czech Republic (#1) Denmark (#1) Dominican Republic (#1) Ecuador (#1) Egypt(#1) El Salvador (#1) Estonia (#1) Finland (#1) France (#1) Germany (#1) Greece (#1) Guatemala (#1) Honduras (#1) Hungary (#1) India (#1) Indonesia (#1) Ireland (#1) Israel (#1) Italia (#1) Jamaica (#1) Japan (#2) Jordan (#1)Kazakhstan (#1) Kenya (#1) Kuwait (#1) Latvia (#1) Lebanon (#1) Lithuania (#1) Luxembourg (#1) Macedonia (#1) Madagascar (#1) Malaysia (#1) Mali (#1) Malta (#1) Mauritius (#1) Mexico (#1) Moldova (#1) Nederland (#1) New Zealand (#2) Nicaragua (#1) Niger (#1) Norway (#1) Pakistan (#1) Panama (#1) Paraguay (#1) Peru (#1) Philipines (#1) Poland (#1) Portugal (#1) Romania (#1) Russia (#1) Saudi Arabia (#1) Senegal (#1) Slovakia (#1) Slovenia (#1) Spain (#1) Sri Lanka (#1) Sweden (#1) Switzerland (#1) Thailand (#1) Tunisia (#1) Turkey (#1) Uganda (#1) United Arab Emirates (#1) United Kingdom (#1) United States (#1) Uruguay (#1) Venezuela (#1) Vietnam (#1)


PokeGal Features: 
- Real Time Dating
- Real Time weather info 
- Off-Game SMS
- Badge Notification
- SMS / Phone Sim
- Facial Expression 
- Tons of NPC, Places, Costumes
- Over 1000 Scripts
- Over 100 Events 
- Support English, Chinese

GamePlay Video
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HlitpI5xE2c

Massive Updates Coming Soon! 
- New Costumes (June 2011)
- Game Center (June 2011) 
- Japanese Version (June 2011)
- Notification (June 2011)

- Voice (July 2011) 
- New Characters (July 2011) 
- Dressing (July 2011) 
- Korean Version (July 2011)

- Multiplayer (August 2011) 
- Party Games (August 2011) 

You've already got the girl, now what do you want to do? You can message her, call her for date and hang out together. 

PokeGal, runs on a real time clock, and there's no actual ending to the game. The iOS title is packed with over 1,000 scripts and 100 events. See? On the Go!

Feel free to leave reviews so we can create the best dating sim experience for everyone!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
